title: Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle: Volume. 2
description: The Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle Vol 2 is the sequel to the greatest collection of ambient soundtracks on the Unreal Marketplace which includes another impressive 150 ambient soundtracks.
longDescription:
The Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle Vol 2 is the sequel to the greatest collection of ambient soundtracks on the Unreal Marketplace which includes another impressive 150 ambient soundtracks. Conveniently split into folders such as Forests, Deserts, Oceans, Alien Worlds & Frozen Tundra's plus many, many more


This bundle is essential for any genre, All tracks are 3 minutes long and easily dropped into your game to immediately set the perfect atmosphere in your next game with 7 and a half hours of beautiful ambient music 


This bundle contains 15 packs with an RRP of $14.99 each so you save a lot of money by purchasing the Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle Vol 2


Includes the following 15 asset packs:
